summary: This is an internal DOJ email from July 22, 2019, alerting that a reporter has information about a police action taking place at Jeffrey Epstein's home in the Caribbean. It appears to be a heads-up within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding potential law enforcement activity at one of Epstein's properties.

events.title: Report of Police Action at Epstein's Caribbean Home
events.description: A reporter informs the U.S. Attorney's Office that some sort of police action is taking place at Jeffrey Epstein's home in the Caribbean.

keyFacts: On July 22, 2019, a reporter alerted the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York about a police action at Jeffrey Epstein's Caribbean home.
The email is an internal FYI notification within the Department of Justice.
The document indicates ongoing law enforcement interest in Epstein's properties around the time of his arrest in July 2019.
